response.overview: My cinematographer Ian Levasseur and myself - Ian Grant - traveled to Ukraine in September of 2022 to meet with cultural leaders from all variety of Ukrainian society to see what they are doing to protest the war, inspire their fellow Ukrainians and to remind the rest of the world why their country is worth fighting for. And while there was no shortage of hard moments and hard stories, the overarching feeling was that of inspiration - of people at all levels of society who are willing to do whatever they can to contribute to a liberated Ukraine.
response.title: Culture Quest: Ukraine
